content: भोज्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} [भुज्-ण्यत्] {@--1@} To be eaten. {@--2@} To be enjoyed or possessed. {@--3@} To be suffered or experienced. {@--4@} To be enjoyed carnally. --ज्यं {@--1@} Food, meal; त्वं भोक्ता अहं च भोज्यभूतः <ls>Pt. 2</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 15</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 240.</ls> {@--2@} A store of provisions, eatables. {@--3@} A dainty. {@--4@} Enjoyment. {@--5@} Advantage, profit. {@--6@} Food given to the Manes.
